definition: (of soil etc) to wash away/to be eroded/(fig.) (of talented staff, followers of a religious faith, investment funds etc) to go elsewhere/to fail to be retained
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: In men, low testosterone levels can cause a loss of bone mass.
sentences.chinese: 对于男性来说，睾丸激素低水平会导致骨量的流失。

sentences.english: Their skins also contain many glands, which also lose water.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤也布有许多皮腺，会流失许多水分。

sentences.english: With more forests being destoryed, huge quantities of good earth are washed away each year.
sentences.chinese: 由于更多森林被破坏，每年有大量的好土壤流失掉了。

sentences.english: Now the "angry river" is under a dual-threat from both soil erosion and a new dam project.
sentences.chinese: 怒江正面临着水土流失和新建大坝的双重威胁。

sentences.english: Maybe we did lose roomers once or twice.
sentences.chinese: 我们可能流失了一次或者两次房客。

sentences.english: The early adopters and trend setters are moving away.
sentences.chinese: 早期的采用者和趋势制定者正在逐步流失。

sentences.english: The cumulative amount of controlled soil and water loss area in Pingchang county, Sichuan province is 782.
sentences.chinese: 四川省平昌县已累计治理水土流失面积782。

sentences.english: The leakage loss of methamidophos was more than that of fenvalerate.
sentences.chinese: 渗漏流失甲胺磷大于氰戊菊酯。

sentences.english: Water and soil loss is an important landforms evolution course.
sentences.chinese: 水土流失其实是一种主要的侵蚀地貌演化过程。

sentences.english: One minus the churn rate is the retention rate .
sentences.chinese: 一减流失率就是保留率。

sentences.english: It turns out that the anti-job-loss policies make workers expensive to employ.
sentences.chinese: 结局是，防止岗位流失政策使雇佣工人变得昂贵。

sentences.english: He is a dropout, and messes around all day.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名流失生，整天游手好闲。

sentences.english: Runners who lost more than 3% of their weight during the run finished fastest.
sentences.chinese: 跑步时流失3%体重的跑者最快跑完。

sentences.english: The state did not leak since death is not a crack.
sentences.chinese: 全地球不会流失，应该死亡并并非一个罅隙。

sentences.english: Four is re- Qian Qingwu, the property drainsseriously.
sentences.chinese: 四是重钱轻物，资产流失严重。

sentences.english: Soil cannot regenerate, so please prevent soil pollution and desertification, and reduce soil erosion.
sentences.chinese: 土壤不能再生，防止土壤污染和沙化，减少水土流失。

definition: to shrink (in the wash)/fig. to shrink (of profits etc)
to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
